item.title: Youtube thumbnails - experience necessary - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone that can make thumbnails on a regular basis. I do a video a day.  I need a theme and I need someone I can work with so we can see what works and what does not. It is a stock trading channel

Hourly Range: $20.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 13:39 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Graphic Design, YouTube Development, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Illustration, Adobe InDesign
Skills: YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Graphic Design, YouTube Development, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Illustration, Adobe InDesign
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.title: Assistant for Video Shoot in Manhattan on Friday 6/28 - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an assistant to help with set up, equipment and other straightforward tasks on a half day testimonial shoot in Manhattan next Friday.

Some experience preferred on photo or film sets. No equipment required.

Midtown Manhattan, 8 am to noon, flat rate payment.

Budget: $140
Posted On: June 19, 2024 13:30 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography
Skills: Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video Animator Needed for Short Interface Component Animation - Upwork
item.description:
Take a few seconds to check out our side to get a feel for our company: https://loops.so

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented video animator to create a short animated video (5-15 seconds) showcasing our new “Lists” feature. This video will be used to announce new features on social media. The animation should include UI elements and transitions to a preference center, adhering to the provided style references.

Requirements:

• Deliverable: MP4
• Duration: 5-15 seconds
• Deadline: July 1
• Style: Pseudo-realistic, using UI elements

Check out the style references and animation ideas in the project brief.

https://tryloops.notion.site/Social-video-1782084cf9144b69858cff87a59fa409?pvs=4

Hourly Range: $48.00-$90.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 13:21 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, Animation, Motion Graphics, Traditional Animation, Adobe After Effects, 3D Animation, Video Editing
Skills: 2D Animation, Animation, Motion Graphics, Traditional Animation, Adobe After Effects, 3D Animation, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
